rules: Add canonical UI binding spec for alerts feed, detail, map pins, and notifications

ui.alert_subtitle: Heat risk advisory reported near Main Stage / crowd-heavy zone
ui.risk_summary: Crowd density and heat can escalate fast into dangerous overheating, even without substances. Act early to cool down.
do_now_bullets: Move to airflow/shade and cool down before you feel cooked
Sip water regularly and use electrolytes if sweating heavily
Buddy-check: hot, confused, dizzy, or cramps = take action now
ui.triage_recommendation: Monitor closely. Seek on-site medical if confusion, fainting, persistent vomiting, or inability to cool down.
ui.notification_title: Heat risk: take a cool-down break
ui.notification_body: Crowd + heat can turn dangerous quickly. Move to airflow, hydrate, buddy-check.

ui.risk_summary: Reports suggest unexpected compounds or unusually strong effects linked to this MDMA. Risk of overdose and medical emergency is higher than normal.
do_now_bullets: Avoid mixing with alcohol or other drugs; keep it simple and safer
Stay with a trusted friend and monitor each other closely
If anyone becomes unusually drowsy, confused, overheated, or collapses: get medical help early
ui.triage_recommendation: High risk: seek on-site medical if symptoms appear or worsen. Call emergency for unconsciousness, seizures, chest pain, or breathing trouble.
ui.notification_body: Unexpected effects reported. Don’t mix, stay with mates, seek medical early if symptoms hit.

ui.alert_subtitle: Bad batch warning reported multiple stages / widespread
ui.risk_summary: Multiple serious reactions have been linked to this batch. Risk is high even at typical amounts. Treat as urgent.
do_now_bullets: Do not take this batch; warn friends nearby immediately
If already taken, avoid alcohol/other drugs and stay monitored with a buddy
Go to medical now if there’s severe agitation, overheating, repeated vomiting, collapse, or confusion
ui.triage_recommendation: Critical: go to on-site medical immediately. Call emergency for unconsciousness, seizures, chest pain, or breathing issues.
